@willemhuman @cobuspienaar @stefanbar @yasserogier 

As discussed guys, please would you include an algorithm to calculate the current maintenance obligation where the case has an escalation percentage. The formula would be adding the percentage of the amount each year for every year since the case was granted.

For example:
If the original amount was R1000 in 2013 with a 10% escalation, it would be R1000 + 10% for 2014 and R1100 + 10% in 2015 (R1210).

If you have any questions, let me know.
